message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it has the potential to be very valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
Alice,  $20,000 is well above my budget.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, however $20,000 is closer to the value I have in mind.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm really hoping to finalize this purchase, so how about we settle on $14,000?  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
